name: Natural Landscapes
description: Encompassing the grandeur and subtlety of nature, from high mountains and glaciers to oceans and lakes, showcasing the rich ecological and geographical diversity of the Earth.

groups.name: Snow-capped Mountains
groups.description: Towering mountain peaks covered in snow and ice, located in high-altitude regions.

groups.name: Lakes and Waterfalls
groups.description: The serene lake surfaces and rushing waterfalls complement each other.

groups.name: Deserts and Gobi
groups.description: The vast expanses of sand and desolate landscapes in extremely arid regions.

groups.name: Forest Landscapes
groups.description: Tall trees and dense greenery form the natural lungs of the Earth.

groups.name: Ocean World
groups.description: The vast ocean domains and marine life in their vibrant blue habitats.

groups.name: Sunrise and Sunset
groups.description: The majestic transformations of the sky during sunrise and sunset.

groups.name: Tropical Rainforests
groups.description: The humid and rainy environments with lush vegetation and diverse species.

groups.name: Grassland Scenery
groups.description: The endless grasslands and freely roaming cattle and sheep.

groups.name: Flower Fields and Countryside
groups.description: The colorful flowers and crops intertwined in a romantic landscape.

groups.name: Hills and Mountains
groups.description: The gentle slopes and lush greenery of low mountains and hills.

groups.name: Island Coastlines
groups.description: The picturesque coastlines and islands outlined by the sea.

groups.name: Aurora Landscapes
groups.description: The spectacular displays of colorful lights in the high-latitude skies.

groups.name: Volcanic Landforms
groups.description: Volcanoes and geothermal landscapes in active or dormant states.

groups.name: Stone Forests and Strange Rocks
groups.description: The uniquely shaped, seemingly carved rock formations.

groups.name: Wetlands and Marshes
groups.description: The water-land transition zones with diverse ecosystems.

groups.name: Polar Ice Caps
groups.description: The massive ice sheets covering the extremely cold regions.

groups.name: Canyons and Gorges
groups.description: The deep valleys formed by rivers or wind erosion, with steep cliffs.

groups.name: Plateau Landscapes
groups.description: The expansive, high-altitude landscapes with unique climates.

groups.name: Karst Landforms
groups.description: The unique geological formations of soluble rocks, such as caves and sinkholes.

groups.name: Wilderness and Wildfields
groups.description: The pristine, untouched natural environments.

groups.name: Seasonal Landscapes
groups.description: The changing natural appearances of spring, summer, autumn, and winter.

groups.name: Rainbow Landscapes
groups.description: The vibrant, breathtaking scenes of rainbows in the sky.

groups.name: Underground Caves
groups.description: The mysterious spaces with stalactites and underground rivers.

groups.name: Ancient Trees
groups.description: The towering, ancient trees that have weathered the years.
